ci_support_linux_64_r_base4.4.yaml:
cdt_name:
- conda
channel_sources:
- conda-forge
channel_targets:
- conda-forge main
cran_mirror:
- https://cran.r-project.org
docker_image:
- quay.io/condaforge/linux-anvil-x86_64:alma9
pin_run_as_build:
  r-base:
    min_pin: x.x
    max_pin: x.x
r_base:
- '4.4'
target_platform:
- linux-64

about.summary: Model agnostic tool for decomposition of predictions from black boxes. Break Down Table shows contributions of every variable to a final prediction.  Break Down Plot presents variable contributions in a concise graphical way.  This package work for binary classifiers and general regression models.

Model agnostic tool for decomposition of predictions from black boxes. Break Down Table shows contributions of every variable to a final prediction.  Break Down Plot presents variable contributions in a concise graphical way.  This package work for binary classifiers and general regression models.

name: r-breakdown
raw_meta_yaml:
{% set version = "0.2.2" %}
{% set posix = 'm2-' if win else '' %}

package:
  name: r-breakdown
  version: {{ version|replace("-", "_") }}

source:
  url:
    - {{ cran_mirror }}/src/contrib/breakDown_{{ version }}.tar.gz
    - {{ cran_mirror }}/src/contrib/Archive/breakDown/breakDown_{{ version }}.tar.gz
  sha256: 9b530418211f43aeba95490f3d4fda13117c3014d458ae68c728ed3b8bc702dc

build:
  number: 2
  noarch: generic
  rpaths:
    - lib/R/lib/
    - lib/

requirements:
  build:
    - {{ posix }}zip               # [win]
  host:
    - r-base
    - r-ggplot2
  run:
    - r-base
    - r-ggplot2

test:
  commands:
    - $R -e "library('breakDown')"           # [not win]
    - "\"%R%\" -e \"library('breakDown')\""  # [win]

about:
  home: https://pbiecek.github.io/breakDown/
  license: GPL-2.0-only
  summary: 'Model agnostic tool for decomposition of predictions from black boxes. Break Down Table shows contributions of every variable to a final prediction.  Break Down Plot presents variable contributions in a concise graphical way.  This package work for binary classifiers and general regression models. '
  license_family: GPL2
  license_file:
    - {{ environ["PREFIX"] }}/lib/R/share/licenses/GPL-2

extra:
  recipe-maintainers:
    - conda-forge/r
